## For Students

**Prospective Ph.D. Students:**
I actively collaborate with doctoral students interested in research at the intersection of AI, digital platforms, and organizational outcomes. Please apply to the [Lally School Ph.D. in Management program](https://lally.rpi.edu/programs/phd-management-stem-designated) directly, but feel free to reach out to talk research.

**Current RPI Students:**
Office hours are by appointment. Please email to schedule a meeting to discuss course material, research opportunities, or career advice.

**Capstone/Practicum Projects:**
If your company is interested in partnering on a capstone or MBA practicum project, please reach out to discuss potential collaborations.

I actively collaborate with companies on:
